value.title: Connection Types in Power BI Import Data or Scheduled Refresh A Detailed Look Inside and Out
value.excerpt: Power BI is one of the BI tools in the market that supports more than one type of connection. Each connection type has pros and cons. value.title: Exception Reporting in Power BI Catch the Error Rows in Power Query
value.excerpt: To build a robust BI system, you need to cater for errors and handle errors carefully. If you build a reporting solution that the refresh of that fails everytime an error occurs, it is not a robust system. Errors can happen by many reasons, In this video, I’ll show you a way to catch potential errors

value.title: Explicit Vs Implicit DAX Measures in Power BI

This is because those values are not explicit measures, they are implicit measures in Power BI. In this article
